contentrichtext.text: The '''Great Lakes Colleges Association''' ('''GLCA''') is a [[consortium]] of 13 [[liberal arts college]]s located in the [[U.S. state|states]] around the [[Great Lakes]]. The 13 schools are located in [[Michigan]], [[Ohio]], [[Pennsylvania]] and [[Indiana]]. It was chartered in the state of Michigan and incorporated as a [[501(c)|501(c)(3)]] [[non-profit organization]] in 1962, the consortium extended its first offer of membership in 46 years to [[Allegheny College]] in 2008. The GLCA offices are located in [[Ann Arbor, Michigan]]. Member institutions are: *[[Albion College]] *[[Antioch College]] *[[Allegheny College]] *[[Denison University]] *[[DePauw University]] *[[Earlham College]] *[[Hope College]] *[[Kalamazoo College]] *[[Kenyon College]] *[[Oberlin College]] *[[Ohio Wesleyan University]] *[[Wabash College]] *[[College of Wooster]] ==External links== *[http://www.glca.org/ Official website] {{GLCA}} [[Category:College and university associations and consortia in the United States]] [[Category:Liberal arts colleges]] [[Category:Organizations based in Ann Arbor, Michigan]]
